mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (id, title, create_time, delete_status) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{title}, now(), '1')
INSERT INTO article_content (pk_id, article_id, craft, content) VALUES (#{contentId}, #{articleId}, #{craft}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM article w WHERE w.delete_status = '1'
SELECT PK_ID, TITLE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM ARTICLE WHERE IS_DEL = '0' ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT T2.PK_ID , T1.TITLE , T2.CONTENT FROM ARTICLE T1 LEFT JOIN ARTICLE_CONTENT T2 ON T1.PK_ID = T2.ARTICLE_ID WHERE T1.PK_ID = #{articleId} AND T2.CRAFT = #{craft}
